column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////We ordered a combination of different tapas which included: galacian empanada of bay scallops
column3: and the rioja braised short rib. They were all excellent. The service was great as well. The server was very attentive. We weren't starving otherwise
column4: we would have also ordered the Paella for dinner. We did order a few deserts though as we were not completely full yet.
